item.title: Baby Blue Eucalyptus
item.dc:creator: user
item.description: The post Baby Blue Eucalyptus appeared first on You Floral.
item.content:encoded:
Home / Bulk Greenery

Baby Blue Eucalyptus

$30.00

Baby Blue Eucalyptus

$30.00

Shipping calculated at checkout.

Category: Bulk Greenery Tag: Blue
Greenery Details

Overview

  • This aromatic eucalyptus has unique shaped leaves that run the length of each stem
  • There are often lots of ‘branches’ off the main stem, so you can cut them off to make your bunch go further. 
  • Baby blue eucalyptus has a strong scent, its the most fragrant type of the eucalyptus. 
  • People love putting baby blue in their shower, the steam releases the oils, giving you a spa like experience!
  • Baby blue is great to dry, just hang it upside down… once dried it’ll last for years.
  • Expected vase life is an average of 14 days with proper care and handling.
  • Note that when you’re working with baby blue eucalyptus, it will leave a sticky residue on your hands, so wear gloves if that bothers you!

Number of Stems

  • Growers Bunch – between 8 and 12 stems
  • Average stem length: 15 to 20 inches
Greenery Care

 For information about general greenery care and important notes about quality, check out our Care Guide

  • Give everything a fresh cut (about 1 inch off), at an angle, with your snips and put them in fresh water. With greenery you don’t have to worry about crowding the same way you do with flowers.
  • Remove any leaves that fall below the waterline of your containers, doing this will help prevent the growth of mold or bacteria which could cause premature wilting.

QUALITY

  • Your greenery will arrive looking thirsty and sleepy. This is absolutely NORMAL
  • Since flowers are a product of Mother Nature, the exact color tones and leaf shape of the greenery may vary to some degree.
  • IMPORTANT ** Not every stem will be perfect. I follow the 5% rule, meaning that out of 100 stems, 5 stems may break while unpacking, look a little too mushed, etc. Don’t let this stress you out! It’s totally normal and to be expected when dealing with fresh/live product.
Quality Help

Recipes are made to be tweaked, but here is a general rule of thumb for quantities of baby blue eucalyptus: 

  • Bridal Bouquet: 1/3 bunch
  • Bridesmaid Bouquet: 1/4 bunch
  • Boutineers: Sprigs
  • Corsages: Sprigs
  • Centerpieces: 1/4 bunch
  • Large Arrangements: 1-2 bunches
Product Video

Related products

  • Salal

    $17.00

  • Monsterra Leaves

    $16.00 – $23.00

  • Eucalyptus – Seeded

    $30.00

  • Silver Queen Pittosporum

    $20.00

The post Baby Blue Eucalyptus appeared first on You Floral.

item.title: Bupleurum
item.dc:creator: user
item.description: The post Bupleurum appeared first on You Floral.
item.content:encoded:
Home / Bulk Greenery

Bupleurum

$25.00

Bupleurum

$25.00

Shipping calculated at checkout.

Category: Bulk Greenery
Greenery Details

Overview

  • Bupleurum has small, delicate leaves that are soft green colour with yellow undertones. 
  • A cheerful and whimsical addition to your designs!
  • This greenery is more delicate than others. It is not suitable for boutonnieres or floral foam.
  • Beautiful in bouquets and vase arrangements. 
  • Expected vase life is an average of 14 days with proper care and handling.

Number of Stems

  • Growers Bunch – around ten stems, see video for bunch size
Greenery Care

For information about general greenery care and important notes about quality, check out our Care Guide

  • Give everything a fresh cut (about 1 inch off), at an angle, with your snips and put them in fresh water. With greenery you don’t have to worry about crowding the same way you do with flowers.
  • Remove any leaves that fall below the waterline of your containers, doing this will help prevent the growth of mold or bacteria which could cause premature wilting.

QUALITY

  • Your greenery will arrive looking thirsty and sleepy. This is absolutely NORMAL
  • Since flowers are a product of Mother Nature, the exact color tones and leaf shape of the greenery may vary to some degree.
  • IMPORTANT ** Not every stem will be perfect. I follow the 5% rule, meaning that out of 100 stems, 5 stems may break while unpacking, look a little too mushed, etc. Don’t let this stress you out! It’s totally normal and to be expected when dealing with fresh/live product.
Specific Greenery Care
  • You can use Quick Dip (a floral product sold at Michaels/Amazon) on stems to help with hydration.
  • Place in warm water when you first receive it.
  • Gently separate stems, as smaller branches can tangle and break
Quality Help

Recipes are made to be tweaked, but here is a general rule of thumb for quantities of bupleurum: 

  • Bridal Bouquet: 1/3 bunch
  • Bridesmaid Bouquet:  1/4 bunch
  • Boutineers:  Sprigs
  •  Corsages: Sprigs
  • Centerpieces: 1/4 bunch
  • Large Arrangements: 1-2 bunches

Related products

  • Silver Queen Pittosporum

    $20.00

  • Plumosa Fern

    $25.00

  • Salal

    $17.00

  • Ruscus – Italian

    $25.00

The post Bupleurum appeared first on You Floral.

item.title: Madronna
item.dc:creator: user
item.description: The post Madronna appeared first on You Floral.
item.content:encoded:
Home / Bulk Greenery

Madronna

$25.00

Madronna

$25.00

Shipping calculated at checkout.

Category: Bulk Greenery
Greenery Details

Overview

  • Madronna has a woody stem with large, dark green, waxy leaves.
  • Great for large centerpieces, the stems can be cut into multiple pieces to fill in your arrangement.
  • These shiny, elongated leaves add a bit of a tropical look to arrangements.

Number of Stems

  • Growers bunch, quantities vary
  • Photo and video shows average bunch size
Greenery Care

For information about general greenery care and important notes about quality, check out our Care Guide

  • Stems can be briefly submerged in a florist solution called “Quick Dip”, this product is recommended for this foliage to keep it hydrated and reduce wilting.
  • If foliage begins to wilt, give stems a fresh cut, briefly submerge in “Quick Dip”, and put in clean warm water.
    Use sharp floral shears to cut through the stubborn bark.
  • Give everything a fresh cut (about 1 inch off), at an angle, with your snips and put them in fresh water. With greenery you don’t have to worry about crowding the same way you do with flowers.
  • Remove any leaves that fall below the waterline of your containers, doing this will help prevent the growth of mold or bacteria which could cause premature wilting.

QUALITY

  • Your greenery will arrive looking thirsty and sleepy. This is absolutely NORMAL
  • Since flowers are a product of Mother Nature, the exact color tones and leaf shape of the greenery may vary to some degree.
  • IMPORTANT ** Not every stem will be perfect. I follow the 5% rule, meaning that out of 100 stems, 5 stems may break while unpacking, look a little too mushed, etc. Don’t let this stress you out! It’s totally normal and to be expected when dealing with fresh/live product.
Quality Help

Recipes are made to be tweaked, but here is a general rule of thumb for quantities of madronna:

  • Bridal Bouquet: N/A – too large
  • Bridesmaid Bouquet: N/A – too large
  • Boutineers: N/A – too large
  • Corsages: N/A – too large
  • Centerpieces: 1/4 bunch
  • Large Arrangements: 1-2 bunches
Product Video

Related products

  • Silver Queen Pittosporum

    $20.00

  • Mrytal

    $25.00

  • Bear Grass

    $10.00

  • Eucalyptus – Seeded

    $30.00

item.title: Mrytal
item.dc:creator: user
item.description: The post Mrytal appeared first on You Floral.
item.content:encoded:
Home / Bulk Greenery

Mrytal

$25.00

Mrytal

$25.00

Shipping calculated at checkout.

Category: Bulk Greenery
Greenery Details

Overview

  • Myrtle is a lovely fragrant foliage with long, beautiful stems.
  • Mrytal has long stems lined with glossy leaves. The leaves are clustered close together, giving a very dense appearance.
  • Perfect for garlands, statements pieces, and arrangements.
  • To add a pop of myrtle into bridal bouquets, the long stems can be cut into multiple shorter pieces
Greenery Care

For information about general greenery care and important notes about quality, check out our Care Guide

  • Myrtle stems can be quite thick and difficult to cut – ensure you have sharp floral shears or clippers at hand.
  • Give everything a fresh cut (about 1 inch off), at an angle, with your snips and put them in fresh water. With greenery you don’t have to worry about crowding the same way you do with flowers.
  • Remove any leaves that fall below the waterline of your containers, doing this will help prevent the growth of mold or bacteria which could cause premature wilting.

QUALITY

  • Your greenery will arrive looking thirsty and sleepy. This is absolutely NORMAL
  • Since flowers are a product of Mother Nature, the exact color tones and leaf shape of the greenery may vary to some degree.
  • IMPORTANT ** Not every stem will be perfect. I follow the 5% rule, meaning that out of 100 stems, 5 stems may break while unpacking, look a little too mushed, etc. Don’t let this stress you out! It’s totally normal and to be expected when dealing with fresh/live product.

Related products

  • Madronna

    $25.00

  • Eucalyptus – Silver Dollar

    $30.00

  • Nagi

    $25.00

  • Weeping Podocarpus

    $25.00

item.title: Bear Grass
item.dc:creator: user
item.description: The post Bear Grass appeared first on You Floral.
item.content:encoded:
Home / Bulk Greenery

Bear Grass

$10.00

Bear Grass

$10.00

Shipping calculated at checkout.

Category: Bulk Greenery
Greenery Details

Overview

  • Bear grass gives your arrangements fun movement and visual interest!
  • Submerge and swirl around vases, braid or tie in knots for boutonnieres and corasages, or simply leave long for a wispy accent to your arrangement!
  • Very long-lasting and perfect for home-staging or to add some greenery to a space that isn’t suitable for houseplants.

Number of Stems

  • Growers bunch, quantities vary
  • Photo and video shows average bunch size
Greenery Care

For information about general greenery care and important notes about quality, check out our Care Guide

  • Give everything a fresh cut (about 1 inch off), at an angle, with your snips and put them in fresh water. With greenery you don’t have to worry about crowding the same way you do with flowers.
  • Remove any leaves that fall below the waterline of your containers, doing this will help prevent the growth of mold or bacteria which could cause premature wilting.

QUALITY

  • Your greenery will arrive looking thirsty and sleepy. This is absolutely NORMAL
  • Since flowers are a product of Mother Nature, the exact color tones and leaf shape of the greenery may vary to some degree.
  • IMPORTANT ** Not every stem will be perfect. I follow the 5% rule, meaning that out of 100 stems, 5 stems may break while unpacking, look a little too mushed, etc. Don’t let this stress you out! It’s totally normal and to be expected when dealing with fresh/live product.
Specific Greenery Care
  • Bear grass should be trimmed and kept in a vase with an inch of clean water – refresh the water frequently.
  • Keep in a humid room or loosely tie a plastic bag over the bucket/vase to prevent drying out.
  • Be careful when handling bear grass – gloves are recommended as you can get a papercut from the blades of grass.
Product Video

Related products

  • Monsterra Leaves

    $16.00 – $23.00

  • Madronna

    $25.00

  • Eucalyptus – Parvifolia

    $30.00

  • Agonis

    $25.00

  • Remove any leaves that fall below the waterline of your containers, doing this will help prevent the growth of mold or bacteria which could cause premature wilting.

QUALITY

  • Your greenery will arrive looking thirsty and sleepy. This is absolutely NORMAL
  • Since flowers are a product of Mother Nature, the exact color tones and leaf shape of the greenery may vary to some degree.
  • IMPORTANT ** Not every stem will be perfect. I follow the 5% rule, meaning that out of 100 stems, 5 stems may break while unpacking, look a little too mushed, etc. Don’t let this stress you out! It’s totally normal and to be expected when dealing with fresh/live product.

item.title: Plumosa Fern
item.dc:creator: user
item.description: The post Plumosa Fern appeared first on You Floral.
item.content:encoded:
Home / Bulk Greenery

Plumosa Fern

$25.00

Plumosa Fern

$25.00

Shipping calculated at checkout.

Category: Bulk Greenery
Greenery Details

Overview

  • Plumosa has is a delicate, wispy foliage that adds an ethereal touch to any style of bouquet or arrangement.
  • Perfect for cascading bouquets or arrangements, as the light stems fall beautifully, while holding their shape.

Number of Stems

  • Growers Bunch
Greenery Care

For information about general greenery care and important notes about quality, check out our Care Guide

  • After cutting stems and placing into water, put a large plastic bag over plumosa and tie around the vessel. This creates higher humidity and helps discourage shedding, which may happen with this variety.
  • Wear gloves! Plumosa looks dainty but has sharp little barbs that can hurt.
  • Give everything a fresh cut (about 1 inch off), at an angle, with your snips and put them in fresh water. With greenery you don’t have to worry about crowding the same way you do with flowers.
  • Remove any leaves that fall below the waterline of your containers, doing this will help prevent the growth of mold or bacteria which could cause premature wilting.

QUALITY

  • Your greenery will arrive looking thirsty and sleepy. This is absolutely NORMAL
  • Since flowers are a product of Mother Nature, the exact color tones and leaf shape of the greenery may vary to some degree.
  • IMPORTANT ** Not every stem will be perfect. I follow the 5% rule, meaning that out of 100 stems, 5 stems may break while unpacking, look a little too mushed, etc. Don’t let this stress you out! It’s totally normal and to be expected when dealing with fresh/live product.
Quality Help

Recipes are made to be tweaked, but here is a general rule of thumb for quantities of plumosa:

  • Bridal Bouquet: 1/3 bunch
  • Bridesmaid Bouquet: 1/4 bunch
  • Boutineers: Sprigs
  • Corsages: Sprigs
  • Centerpieces: 1/4 bunch
  • Large Arrangements: 1-2 bunches
Product Video

Related products

  • Eucalyptus – Seeded

    $30.00

  • Eucalyptus – Parvifolia

    $30.00

    $25.00

item.title: Dagger Fern
item.dc:creator: user
item.description: The post Dagger Fern appeared first on You Floral.
item.content:encoded:
Home / Bulk Greenery

Dagger Fern

$25.00

Dagger Fern

$25.00

Shipping calculated at checkout.

Category: Bulk Greenery
Greenery Details

Overview

  • Dagger fern is hardy, long lasting, and easy to work with.
  • The long, elegant spears give a natural garden look to bouquets or centrepieces.
  • Dagger Fern is characterized by its bright, fresh green colour.

Number of Stems

  • Growers Bunch – between 15 and 20 stems
  • Average stem length: 15 to 20 inches
Greenery Care

For information about general greenery care and important notes about quality, check out our Care Guide

  • Note that the leaves are somewhat delicate and can occasionally need a trim with scissors to maintain shape.
  • Give everything a fresh cut (about 1 inch off), at an angle, with your snips and put them in fresh water. With greenery you don’t have to worry about crowding the same way you do with flowers.
  • Remove any leaves that fall below the waterline of your containers, doing this will help prevent the growth of mold or bacteria which could cause premature wilting.

QUALITY

  • Your greenery will arrive looking thirsty and sleepy. This is absolutely NORMAL
  • Since flowers are a product of Mother Nature, the exact color tones and leaf shape of the greenery may vary to some degree.
  • IMPORTANT ** Not every stem will be perfect. I follow the 5% rule, meaning that out of 100 stems, 5 stems may break while unpacking, look a little too mushed, etc. Don’t let this stress you out! It’s totally normal and to be expected when dealing with fresh/live product.
Quality Help

Recipes are made to be tweaked, but here is a general rule of thumb for quantities of dagger fern:

  • Bridal Bouquet: 1/4 bunch
  • Bridesmaid Bouquet: 1/6 bunch
  • Boutineers: Sprigs
  • Corsages: Sprigs
  • Centerpieces: 1/8 bunch
  • Large Arrangements: 1-2 bunches

Related products

  • Ruscus – Italian

    $25.00

  • Madronna

    $25.00

Leatherleaf Fern

$25.00

Category: Bulk Greenery
Greenery Details
Overview

  • The stem branches out in a triangular shape and is great to add body to floral décor.

Number of Stems

  • Growers Bunch – between 15 and 20 stems
  • Average stem length: 15 to 20 inches

For information about general greenery care and important notes about quality, check out our Care Guide

  • Since flowers are a product of Mother Nature, the exact color tones and leaf shape of the greenery may vary to some degree.
  • IMPORTANT ** Not every stem will be perfect. I follow the 5% rule, meaning that out of 100 stems, 5 stems may break while unpacking, look a little too mushed, etc. Don’t let this stress you out! It’s totally normal and to be expected when dealing with fresh/live product.
Quality Help

item.title: Olive
item.dc:creator: user
item.description: The post Olive appeared first on You Floral.
item.content:encoded:
Home / Bulk Greenery

Olive

$25.00

Olive

$25.00

Shipping calculated at checkout.

Category: Bulk Greenery
Greenery Details

Overview

  • Olive foliage has spear-shaped leaves that run the length of each stem.
  • Beautiful, 2-toned foliage is pale green on top and silvery-white underneath.
  • Perfect for garden-style and bohemian bouquets and useful in any type of arrangement.
  • Expected vase life is an average of 14 days with proper care and handling.
  • Occasionally this product is hard to source, if this happens, we’ll inform you and suggest alternatives!
  • Olive has muted green leaves and woody stems, it has a very “Mediterranean” appearance to it.

Number of Stems

  • Growers Bunch – between 8 and 12 stems
  • Average stem length: 20 to 25 inches
Greenery Care

For information about general greenery care and important notes about quality, check out our Care Guide

  • Give everything a fresh cut (about 1 inch off), at an angle, with your snips and put them in fresh water. With greenery you don’t have to worry about crowding the same way you do with flowers.
  • Remove any leaves that fall below the waterline of your containers, doing this will help prevent the growth of mold or bacteria which could cause premature wilting.

QUALITY

  • Your greenery will arrive looking thirsty and sleepy. This is absolutely NORMAL
  • Since flowers are a product of Mother Nature, the exact color tones and leaf shape of the greenery may vary to some degree.
  • IMPORTANT ** Not every stem will be perfect. I follow the 5% rule, meaning that out of 100 stems, 5 stems may break while unpacking, look a little too mushed, etc. Don’t let this stress you out! It’s totally normal and to be expected when dealing with fresh/live product.
Quantity Help

Recipes are made to be tweaked, but here is a general rule of thumb for quantities of olive:

  • Bridal Bouquet: 1/3 bunch
  • Bridesmaid Bouquet:  1/4 bunch
  • Boutineers:  Sprigs
  • Corsages: Sprigs
  • Centerpieces: 1/4 bunch
  • Large Arrangements: 1-2 bunches
Product Video
